title: x/tools/cmd/tipgodoc: indexing is not enabled
body:
Indexing (search) is available on https://golang.org/ but not on https://tip.golang.org/ . Is there any particular reason for this? (A quick search of issues and the groups didn't seem to bring up anything relevant.)

Unless it has been disabled on purpose, I think it would be preferable if search for tip worked just like on https://golang.org/ , especially considering that tip pages are excluded from search engines.
